history.proof: intros a b c Hab Hbc. qauto use: Z.divide_mul_r unfold: Z.divide.

original: intros a b c Hab Hbc. apply ZMicromega.Zgcd_minus. apply Z.gcd_greatest with (a := a) (b := b). - apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply Zdivide_opp_r_rev. apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2. apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply ZMicromega.Zgcd_minus. apply Gauss with (b := a) (c := b). apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply Hab. apply Zdivide_opp_l. apply Hbc. - apply Zdivide_opp_r_rev. apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply ZMicromega.Zgcd_minus. apply Gauss with (b := a) (c := b). apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply Hab. apply Zdivide_opp_l. apply Hbc.
